Title: The Garrison Commander
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Ira Steven Behr (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Graham McTavish
Plot: Claire and Dougal are questioned at the local garrison, and Dougal is treated with hostility and disdain by the British occupiers. Claire lets down her guard, but her headstrong opinions ...
